plugin.name: xml-validator
plugin.author: Brent Halsey
plugin.title: Plugin summary/headline
plugin.description: Provides a simple mechanism to validate xml on the request with a given schema. Schema can be passed in as a relative file path or as a string. Throws SAXException for any validation errors. Syntax is easy to remember: change the familiar request.XML access into a method with the schema passed as an argument: request.XML( schemaInput )
